meanings.definition: Most pleasing or attractive in appearance
meanings.sent1: The flower garden was filled with the loveliest roses.
meanings.sent2: She wore the loveliest dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The puppy thought the loveliest shoe was a chew toy!
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the loveliest shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The loveliest smile brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: Most delightful or charming in character
meanings.sent1: Her kindness made her the loveliest person in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The children's laughter was the loveliest sound in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten thought the loveliest game was hiding socks.
meanings.sent4: His words were the loveliest melody to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The loveliest gesture brought tears of joy to her eyes.
